title: Person of interest | Kings & pawns
author: Eyildr
comment: Thanks to u for putting the deep philosophical POI statements in such a wonderful video!!! What matured content this show has!!! MUST WATCH FOR ALL!!!
This is really great! Yes, this season is so great I can't even explain how much I'm loving it. POI writers are real geniuses :)
This whole show is such a masterpiece! I just keep re-watching all these videos on daily basis like a crazy person xD
Woah, this was stunning! I loved your use of the quotes about sacrifice at 1:00 and 1:17, that gave me chills. Beautiful!
You are a BRILLIANT editor. I don't give praise like that easily. You have a creative flair while adhering to a clear narrative. Love it. Hope you vid the new season!
description:
Disclaimer: NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT INTENDED.

My little tribute for the first part of season 4 of Person of interest. I think this season has some of the best written episodes of the show and I can't wait to watch more of it. I love it more and more as I watch it. The trilogy was amazing and I hope to see Shaw soon, even if I have to wait a couple of seasons more (hopefully the show gets renewed in the meantime). So yep, please watch in HD and enjoy! 

Show: Person of Interest
Music: Ólafur Arnalds - Til Enda

Disclaimer: NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT INTENDED
